comments.comment: Maya always tries her best and this is reflected in her outcomes.
Maya always gets involved in learning activities.
Maya contributions have a significant impact on her own learning and influencing the learning of others.
Maya can give others feedback that develops both herself and others.
Maya can effectively and critically evaluate her own performance and make improvements.
Maya is keen to celebrate the achievement and success of others.
Maya always tries her best and this is reflected in her outcomes.
Maya thrives on deliberate stretch and challenges herself to progress in her learning.
Maya consistently takes on and responds positively to challenges.
Maya uses her initiative to extend her learning and that of others.
Maya proactively seeks feedback that is acted upon with tangible improvements made.
Maya can effectively lead and inspire the learning of others.
Maya regularly gets involved in learning activities.
Maya is consistently reflective on her work and her feedback, exploring different ways to improve it.
Maya always learns well with others, making her own contributions whilst valuing and respecting the contributions of others.
Maya always communicates clearly and confidently with others.
